name: Chet Minkus gets lost in the Industrial District
name_original: Chet Minkus gets lost in the Industrial District
description:
Chet Minkus gets lost in the Industrial District, and there's no helping him. 

  • Wander a giant open world with nothing to do in it
  • Cry for help
  • There is no goal
  • There is no end
  • Chet Minkus is doomed forever

A 1-minute gag game made in two hours with a bunch of unity assets.
